sentence: The room was not cleaned properly and the bathroom was in need of a few urgent repairs
I can not comment on the normal rooms but if this as the standard of the executive levels then I would anticipate that the non executive levels would be even more tired and in need of refurbishment

They offered to move me later at night but that is after my elderly father and I settled in his stuff for a one night stop also ordered a wake up call that never came at 5 am because I had an early flight to catch the executive lounge smelled the location is very good and easy to reach the hotel is old and in need of renovation I sent them 2 emails the past 3 months ago July and received no answer till this day late sep the complimentary full speed Internet was slow and cutting off but also occasionally fast

The pressure and also quantity of water was extremely poor which made showering and shaving almost useless hopefully this will be addressed in the renovations Full buffet breakfast for 2 was included in our 260 night rate and it was excelentEven though we got down there late st around 10 am they close bfast at 11 am they still topped up dishes with fresh items as well as cooked eggs to your liking and pancakes and waffles
Check in was slow and hotel needs refurbishment as is getting a little tired looking
It does have a traditional feel to it but you can see the age of the property in some places and it does need some maintenance returb work
team determines that I should be moved out so repairs can be made
Shabby and overdue for a makeover this centrally positioned Mariot is tired and unloved

As an aside we had to spend hours extra in the room as the maintenance crews could not get the safe sorted out and it had locked our cash and jewellery in it this transpired twice and only on the 3rd attempt after I complained that my idea of going from South Africa to Brisbane on holiday was not one planned around guarding our asts whilst strangers rummaged through them
Saturday morning from 6 am they must have had renovations going and was woken by drilling and happening
Overall great Renovated bathroom
The bathroom was also renovated with a great large shower stall no tub and lots of room
Hotel has recently been renovated to a high standard rooms are tasteful furnished well appointed with the standard very comfy bed
Fantastic hotel post refurbishment
We enjoyed our stay and new renovations are excellent
The location and views are unbeatable and the newly renovated rooms are pleasant
Lovely to see the new renovations 20 million apparently
Rooms are nice and renovated
Firstly the rooms are good nicely renovated to a good international standard
Quiet efficient renovated hotel in good location
